intro: The v-overlay component is used to provide emphasis on a particular element or parts of it. It signals to the user of a state change within the application and can be used for creating loaders, dialogs and more.

advanced.heading: Advanced
advanced.intro: Using the v-hover, we are able to add a nice scrim over the information card with additional actions the user can take.

loader.heading: Loader
loader.intro: Using the v-overlay as a background, add a progress component to easily create a custom loader.
